sn22.123:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn22.123:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.123:5.1: “Sutavatāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
sn22.123:5.8: Sutavatāvuso koṭṭhika, bhikkhunā ime pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato … pe …
sn22.123:5.11: yaṃ sutavā bhikkhu ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato … pe …
sn22.123:5.12: anattato yoniso manasi karonto sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikareyyā”ti.
sn22.123:6.1: “Sotāpannena panāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
sn22.123:6.2: “Sotāpannenapi kho āvuso koṭṭhika, bhikkhunā ime pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato … pe …
sn22.123:6.5: yaṃ sotāpanno bhikkhu ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato … pe …
sn22.123:6.6: anattato yoniso manasi karonto sakadāgāmiphalaṃ … pe …
sn22.123:7.1: “Arahatā panāvuso sāriputta, katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
sn22.123:7.2: “Arahatāpi khvāvuso koṭṭhika, ime pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato anattato yoniso manasi kātabbā.
sn22.123:7.3: Natthi, khvāvuso, arahato uttari karaṇīyaṃ, katassa vā paticayo;
sn22.123:7.4: api ca kho ime dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya ceva saṃvattanti satisampajaññāya cā”ti.
